accomplishments:
Developed a monitor snapshot, comparison and restore toolkit enabling safe, automated visibility into monitor changes across the VA ecosystem.  It introduced timestamped snapshots, diff-based change tracking, deleted monitor recovery, and dashboard generation for both triage and error tracking giving Watchtower full traceability and data integrity for all Datadog monitors, preventing loss of critical configurations and laying the groundwork for reliable repeatable observability analytics across VA systems.  




Developed the Datadog Alert Summary Reporter, a system used to generate weekly, monthly, and lifetime enhanced reports for leadership.  It transforms raw Datadog event data into structured, priority-aware markdown reports, automatically categorizing monitors by team, service, and behavior (expected/transient/defect).  The system made recurring alert patterns, flappiness, and ownership measurable shifting Watchtower from reactive alert review to proactive reliability analysis.  




Developed a triage report generator, automating daily Watch workflows.  It creates ready-to-use triage reports with monitor context, Slack messaging templates, and issue linking for recurring alerts.  This helps teams resolve issues faster and streamlines communications allowing those on the Watch the ability to focus on other tasks.
enps_comments:
**Sridhar Vennela:**
I would enthusiastically rehire Kevin for his role on my team. He consistently demonstrates **strong integrity**, **collaboration**, and a genuine commitment to team success. Kevin approaches challenges with a positive mindset, communicates openly, and supports others to achieve shared goals. His reliability and teamwork make him a valuable contributor to any project.

**Art Tovar:**
I would **enthusiastically rehire** Kevin for his role on my team. He demonstrates all the characteristics of a top performer, especially in his courage and focus on impact. Kevin consistently exhibits **Be Bold** by taking on difficult conversations and providing open and honest feedback, which has fundamentally shaped our relationship with our stakeholder for the better. Beyond his immediate assignments, he is always willing to take on any work and courageously asks the tough questions to ensure what we are doing is actually making an impact. This critical focus ensures the team remains aligned to **Outcomes in Production.**

**Brent Baumann:**
Kevin is an exceptional collaborator and a proactive driver of customer success.
**Customer Impact & Proactivity:** Kevin embodies the principles to **Do the Right Thing** and **Be Bold** by consistently finding new ways to identify and resolve critical bottlenecks and systemic problems. He demonstrates genuine **Grit**, which ensures he often prevents customer-reported issues before they arise, resulting in tangible **Outcomes in Production**.




Kevin always focuses on effective solutions, living the principle of **Do What Works** and **Do What is Required**. He is highly collaborative and eagerly shares knowledge and tips across teams. He helps us **Keep it Real** by addressing issues directly and focusing on practical solutions. Above all, he is a shining example of **Always be Kind**, consistently maintaining a friendly and positive demeanor, which makes him an absolute pleasure to work with.

**Coty Allen:**
It was great to collaborate with Kevin this year on VA work happening within our different delivery stacks.
start_stop_keep:
**Sridhar Vennela:**
**Start:**
- Proactively share technical insights and lessons learned across teams to strengthen Rise8’s collective knowledge.
**Keep:**
- Demonstrating **strong integrity**, **collaboration**, and a team-first mindset.
- Maintaining his consistent communication and willingness to support others, which makes him a trusted and dependable teammate.

**Art Tovar:**
**Start** actively seeking and contributing new ideas that allow our team to deliver measurable outcomes  and expand our mission impact. You are highly respected by the team and have established trust with our stakeholder; leverage that capital to identify unserved or under-served needs. Continue to Be Bold and vocal in sharing these high-impact ideas when you see them.




**Stop** allowing the challenges or constraints of our current environment to cause discouragement. The success of highly aligned, loosely coupled work is dependent upon the collaborative efforts of high performance individuals. We need you to maintain your positive attitude and unwavering Grit by continuing to find solutions and make things better, even when the situation is tough.




**Keep** being bold and not afraid of delivering great, candid feedback that positively shapes our team and stakeholder relationships. Your ability to challenge directly while providing quality feedback ensures we cultivate meaningful relationships and maintain a culture of radical truth and transparency.

**Brent Baumann:**
I recommend Kevin continue to expand the successful collaboration efforts initiated over the last year. To maximize the impact of his unique approach to bottleneck identification, I encourage him to seek opportunities to increase his visibility and share his knowledge more broadly with the team. A **Lightning Talk** would be an excellent platform for him to educate his peers on his methods.

**Coty Allen:**
Keep:  Sharing what's working with other SRE's in other programs.
